speech: "We're going to have a short activity during our lesson today."
speaker: Hedge Professor

speech: "Do you need a tutorial on how to do the chemistry activity?"
speaker: Hedge Professor

directions.speech: "In chemistry our activity will be a matching game."
directions.speaker: Hedge Professor

directions.speech: "Flip over tiles to match potions of the same color."
directions.speaker: Hedge Professor

directions.speech: "The twist is that there are multiple bottle shapes. Matching different shapes will decrease stability, while the same shape will increase stability."
directions.speaker: Hedge Professor

directions.speech: "Failing to make a match at all will also decrease stability."
directions.speaker: Hedge Professor

directions.speech: "You probably don't want it to reach the bottom."
directions.speaker: Hedge Professor

directions.speech: "Of course, you also have to finish before the end of class, so there's a time limit."
directions.speaker: Hedge Professor
